name: DNS Lookup Result Comparison
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>
description:
This module can be used to determine differences
      in the cache entries between two DNS servers. This is
      primarily useful for detecting cache poisoning attacks,
      but can also be used to detect geo-location load balancing.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: BASEDNS
options.description: The DNS cache server to use as a baseline

options.name: TARGDNS
options.description: The DNS cache server to test

options.name: NAMES
options.description: The list of host names that should be tested (comma separated)

options.name: CHECK_AUTHORITY
options.description: Set this to true to verify authority records

options.name: CHECK_ADDITIONAL
options.description: Set this to true to verify additional records
